annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: B. Special arrangements applicable to investment gold transactions
annotations.translation: B. 适用于投资黄金交易的特别安排

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas since the new tax scheme will replace existing provisions under Article 12(3)(e) and point 26 of Annex F of the Sixth Directive, these provisions should be deleted,
annotations.translation: 鉴于新的税收计划将取代第六号指令附件 F 第 12(3)(e) 条和第 26 点项下的现有规定，这些规定应予删除，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Member States shall exempt from value added tax the supply, intra-Community acquisition and importation of investment gold, including investment gold represented by certificates for allocated or unallocated gold or traded on gold accounts and including, in particular, gold loans and swaps, involving a right of owner ship or claim in respect of investment gold, as well as transactions concerning investment gold involving futures and forward contracts leading to a transfer of right of ownership or claim in respect of investment gold.
annotations.translation: 成员国应对投资性黄金的供应、共同体内收购和进口免征增值税，包括由已分配或未分配黄金证书代表的投资性黄金或在黄金账户上交易的投资性黄金，特别是包括涉及投资性黄金所有权或索赔权的黄金贷款和掉期，以及涉及导致投资性黄金的所有权或索赔权转让的期货和远期合约的投资性黄金交易。

annotations.text: The following Article 26b shall be added to Directive 77/388/EEC:
annotations.translation: 第 77/388/EEC 号指令应增加以下第 26b 条：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Member States shall also exempt services of agents who act in the name and for the account of another when they intervene in the supply of investment gold for their principal.
annotations.translation: 成员国还应豁免以他人名义并为他人账户行事的代理人在为其委托人干预投资黄金供应时所提供的服务。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Special scheme for investment gold
annotations.translation: 投资性黄金特别计划

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: A. Definition
annotations.translation: A. 定义

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: C. Option to tax
annotations.translation: C. 征税选择权

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For the purposes of this Directive, and without preju dice to other Community provisions: "investment gold" shall mean:
annotations.translation: 就本指令而言，在不影响其他共同体规定的情况下：“投资性黄金”是指：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Member States shall allow taxable persons who produce investment gold or transform any gold into investment gold as defined in A a right of option for taxation of supplies of investment gold to another taxable person which would otherwise be exempt under B.
annotations.translation: 成员国应允许生产投资性黄金或将任何黄金转化为 A 中定义的投资性黄金的应税人享有对供应给另一应税人的投资性黄金进行征税的选择权，否则根据 B 的规定，此类供应可免税。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) gold, in the form of a bar or a wafer of weights accepted by the bullion markets, of a purity equal to or greater than 995 thousandths, whether or not represented by securities. Member States may exclude from the scheme small bars or wafers of a weight of 1 g or less;
annotations.translation: (i) 纯度等于或大于千分之九百九十五，其重量为金银市场所接受的金条或金块，不论是否以有价证券代表。成员国可将重量为 1 克或以下的小金条或小金块排除在该计划之外；

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Member States may allow taxable persons, who in their trade normally supply gold for industrial purposes, a right of option for taxation of supplies of investment gold as defined in A(i) to another taxable person, which would otherwise be exempt under B. Member States may restrict the scope of this option.
annotations.translation: 成员国可以允许在其贸易中通常为工业目的供应黄金的应税人有权选择对 A(i) 中定义的投资性黄金供应向另一个应税人征税，否则根据 B 的规定，此类供应可免税。 成员国可限制该选择权的范围。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) gold coins which:
annotations.translation: (ii) 符合以下条件的金币：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: - are of a purity equal to or greater than 900 thousandths,
annotations.translation: - 纯度等于或大于千分之九百，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: - are minted after 1800,
annotations.translation: - 1800 年后铸造的，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: - are or have been legal tender in the country of origin, and
annotations.translation: - 是或曾经是原产国的法定货币，以及

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: - are normally sold at a price which does not exceed the open market value of the gold contained in the coins by more than 80%.
annotations.translation: - 出售价格通常不超过金币中所含黄金的公开市场价值的 80%。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Where the supplier has exercised a right of option for taxation pursuant to the first or second paragraph, Member States shall allow a right of option for taxation for the agent in respect of the services mentioned in the second paragraph of B.
annotations.translation: 如果供应商根据第一段或第二段行使了征税选择权，成员国应允许代理人就 B 第二段中提到的服务享有征税选择权。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Such coins are not, for the purpose of this Directive, considered to be sold for numismatic interest.
annotations.translation: 就本指令而言，此类金币不被视为以钱币权益为目的出售。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Member States shall specify the details of the use of these options, and shall inform the Commission of the rules of application for the exercise of these options in that Member State.
annotations.translation: 成员国应规定这些选择权的使用细节，并应告知委员会在该成员国行使这些选择权的适用规则。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Each Member State shall inform the Commission before 1 July each year, starting in 1999, of the coins meeting these criteria which are traded in that Member State. The Commission shall publish a comprehensive list of these coins in the "C" series of the Official Journal of the European Communities before 1 December each year. Coins included in the published list shall be deemed to fulfil these criteria for the whole year for which the list is published.
annotations.translation: 自 1999 年起，各成员国应在每年 7 月 1 日之前向委员会通报在该成员国交易的符合这些标准的金币。委员会应于每年 12 月 1 日之前在《欧洲共同体官方公报》的“C”系列中公布这些金币的综合清单。列入公布名单的金币应被视为在公布名单的整年中都符合这些标准。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: D. Right of deduction
annotations.translation: D. 扣除权

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. Taxable persons shall be entitled to deduct
annotations.translation: 1. 应税人有权扣除

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) tax due or paid in respect of investment gold supplied to them by a person who has exercised the right of option under C or supplied to them pursuant to the procedure laid down in G;
annotations.translation: (a) 已行使 C 所规定的选择权或根据 G 所规定的程序提供给他们的投资性黄金的应缴税款或已缴税款；
